"MY FAIR SUPER HERO",2007,2
The Mighty Avengers star's solo series heats up as Wonder Man, Ms. Marvel, and Beast begin in earnest to try and rehabilitate super-assassin Ladykiller-but what has she got to say about it? Who's pulling whose strings...and more importantly, why? Loyalties are put to the test and motivations are questioned,
as only Peter David & Andre Currie can do it!
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
